name: Magical Music Tour!
description:
MUSIC IS MAGIC!
in the world of immortal witches, music is one of the ultimate expressions of individualism.  Can your stars survive the cutthroat world of music where making a hit a single can be harder than fighting a horde of angry redcaps? 

The new improved "MAGICAL MUSIC TOUR", updates the old magical minutia with new rules, new cliques, spells, equipment, and more to help Directors bring the magical world of music to life for stars.
